Author: IhaveAthingForYou2

Comment: While everyone seems to be focusing on the race part of this, what sticks out more to me is the "permission to vote for Democrats" part that reveals just how wrong they are.  Men (actual men) don't need permission from anyone to vote however they see fit.  Men weight the merits of two competing options, cross reference that to their own values and choose which option better suits them.  It's this simple and nothing more needs be considered.  The reason the Democrats believe this is because they view every single thing via group identity whereas anyone voting is doing so as an individual.  It's an individual that enters the voting booth and it's an individual that choose who they vote for.  Not the various groups the Democrats attach that individual to.  Identity politics like that is, really, just being sheer fucking lazy.  Don't examine the core aspects of your policies (did the Democrats even HAVE policies in this last election?) and see if they resonate with what American voters want...nah, chuck all that and just go straight to pandering on a group level.  This is why they're in decline, so detached from the American electorate and why, I hope, they don't wise up anytime soon...if ever.
